title: Can You Really Call This An Hotel, I Didnt Receive A Mint Under My Pillow Or Anything

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-The player you leave a mint under Is notified. Any night after you left the mint, they will be able to eat it, roleblocking them but granting them Invincible Defense.
-The night after a player eats a Mint, they may use their ability twice that night.
